summary: This is an email exchange between Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boles Schiller Flexner LLP, and a victim specialist at the New York Field Office regarding an upcoming Epstein victim briefing. The email discusses sending out invitations and includes confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boles Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: She is the recipient of an email regarding an Epstein victim briefing, thanked for her work on behalf of victims.

events.title: Email Exchange on Epstein Victim Briefing
events.description: Email correspondence discussing an upcoming briefing for Epstein victims and the sending of invitations.

keyFacts: Sigrid McCawley, a lawyer, is involved in work on behalf of Epstein victims as of September 2019.
A victim briefing was being organized, with invitations planned to be sent out.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege protections.
